com.hurence.logisland.util.kafka

Class EmbeddedKafkaEnvironment

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hurence.logisland.util.kafka.EmbeddedKafkaEnvironment

  • public class EmbeddedKafkaEnvironment
extends Object
    Initialises a Kafka context with an embedded zookeeper server and a client... just ready for producing events For online documentation see https://github.com/apache/kafka/blob/0.8.2/core/src/test/scala/unit/kafka/utils/TestUtils.scala https://github.com/apache/kafka/blob/0.8.2/core/src/main/scala/kafka/admin/TopicCommand.scala https://github.com/apache/kafka/blob/0.8.2/core/src/test/scala/unit/kafka/admin/TopicCommandTest.scala
